features: Collar is lined with tricot fabric for softness and comfort
Thermal Mapping® technology places performance fabrics where you need them most to maximize warmth, breathability and movement
Flex points are crafted with a narrower quilting pattern to enhance fit and improve range of motion
Storm flap underneath 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
2 exterior pockets: hand pockets with zipper closures, lined with mesh for added ventilation when needed
Signature double-stripe reflective details at back of collar, and reflective stitching at armholes, for added visibility in low light
Packable into wearer's exterior right pocket. When packed, it has a large loop for hand-held carrying, and a smaller loop for a carabiner to clip onto a bag or waistband
